training_data_schema.description: Comprehensive training data structure for BookSwap chatbot

intent_classification.description: Data for training intent classification model

structure.entities: object - extracted entities from the query

sample_training_data.query: Can you recommend some good science fiction books?
sample_training_data.response: Here are some excellent science fiction books: 1. Dune by Frank Herbert 2. The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy by Douglas Adams 3. Ender's Game by Orson Scott Card. Check our Gallery to see if any are available!

sample_training_data.query: How do I donate my old textbooks?
sample_training_data.response: To donate textbooks: 1. Go to 'Add Book' page 2. Fill in textbook details 3. Select 'Donate' as type 4. Upload photos 5. Submit! Your textbooks will help students save money.

sample_training_data.query: I'm having trouble uploading a book photo
sample_training_data.response: Photo upload issues: 1. File should be under 5MB 2. Use JPG/PNG format 3. Check internet connection 4. Try refreshing the page. Photos are optional but helpful!
